form.name: form1

span.div: Remote learning will continue until the end of the school year due to a mandate from Governor DeWine.

*Due to the shelter at home mandate from Governor DeWine and the Director of ODH, the regular meeting of the Teays Valley Local School District Board of Education will be held as scheduled on April 27, 2020, at the board office at 6:30 p.m. with some or all board members attending via Google Meets. The meeting will be streamed live at https://www.tvsd.us/BoardMeeting-LiveStream.aspx. If you have information to provide to the Board in lieu of public participation section of the meeting, please submit the information to Stacy Overly at [email protected] by noon on April 27.
